lesson: Unit 2 - Talking about Career Goals Quiz

questions.question: How do you say 'I want to advance in my career' in Arabic?
answers: أرغب في التقدم في مسيرتي المهنية
questions.correct: أرغب في التقدم في مسيرتي المهنية

questions.question: Which one means 'My goal is to become a manager'
How do you say 'I am looking for professional growth' in Arabic?
Which one means 'I want to gain more experience'
answers: أرغب في اكتساب المزيد من الخبرة
questions.correct: أرغب في اكتساب المزيد من الخبرة

questions.question: How do you say 'I am interested in learning new skills' in Arabic?
Which one means 'My ambition is to lead a team'
How do you say 'I want to work for a multinational company' in Arabic?
answers: أرغب في العمل لدى شركة متعددة الجنسيات
questions.correct: أرغب في العمل لدى شركة متعددة الجنسيات

questions.question: Which one means 'My goal is to learn a new language'
How do you say 'I am planning to pursue further studies' in Arabic?
Which one means 'I want to build strong professional relationships'
answers: أرغب في بناء علاقات مهنية قوية
questions.correct: أرغب في بناء علاقات مهنية قوية

questions.question: How do you say 'I am interested in a leadership role' in Arabic?
Which one means 'My goal is to work in an international company'
answers: هدفي هو العمل في شركة دولية
questions.correct: هدفي هو العمل في شركة دولية

questions.question: How do you say 'I am passionate about continuous learning' in Arabic?
Which one means 'I am open to new career opportunities'
answers: أنا منفتح على فرص عمل جديدة
questions.correct: أنا منفتح على فرص عمل جديدة

questions.question: How do you say 'My goal is to achieve a senior position' in Arabic?
answers: هدفي هو الوصول إلى منصب رفيع
questions.correct: هدفي هو الوصول إلى منصب رفيع
